author: Anonymous Beaker
title: HTDD function not defined
question:
Hi, I was testing out a code from the lectures and when I tried to run the code, it says the following:
Does anyone know what's wrong?
student_answer: It’s weird that this is happening since it’s a lecture file, but I believe why that error is showing up is because (require spd/tags) needs to be at the top of the code for @htdd to work, just like how primitives like rectangle and circle won't be defined until we have (require 2htdp/image) at the top of the code.
